name: Infinite Respawn
description:
This game was meant for the Wowie Game Jam 3.0

You have to go through levels reaching the goal cube.

Most of the development was made by myself, but I would also like to give credit to assets and tutorials I have used to make this game possible.

The music: "13-Emotional - Thinking" came from the Inspirational Soundtrack Vol. 3 by JDB Artist [Humble Bundle]

Some Tutorials that really helped me
- "2D Double / TRIPLE JUMP PLATFORMER CONTROLLER - EASY UNITY TUTORIAL" by Blackthornprod [YouTube]

- Too many tutorials from Brackeys [YouTube]

Lastly, thank you very much for playing my game!
